automig:dump.description: Dump records in Salesforce org to CSV files for migration usage

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

objects.name: objects
objects.description: object names to dump, optionally paired with target scope (e.g. Account,Contact,User:related)

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: output directory for dumped CSV files

defaultnamespace.name: defaultnamespace
defaultnamespace.description: developer namespace prefix for managed packages

excludebom.name: excludebom
excludebom.description: do not prepend byte order mark (\ufeff) in output files

ignorefields.name: ignorefields
ignorefields.description: list of object.field path to exclude from dumping (e.g. Account.OwnerId,OpportunityLineItem.TotalPrice)

ignoresystemdate.name: ignoresystemdate
ignoresystemdate.description: exclude system-defined date fields from the dump target (e.g. CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate)

ignorereadonly.name: ignorereadonly
ignorereadonly.description: exclude non-createable fields from the dump target

verbose.name: verbose
verbose.description: emit additional command output to stdout

automig:load.description: Load records from CSV files to Salesforce org, resolving relationships between records

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

inputdir.name: inputdir
inputdir.description: directory which includes input data files in CSV

targetobjects.name: targetobjects
targetobjects.description: list of object names to include in loading

ignoreobjects.name: ignoreobjects
ignoreobjects.description: list of object names to exclude from loading

mappingobjects.name: mappingobjects
mappingobjects.description: list of object and key field name pair to map to existing records (e.g. User:Email,RecordType:DeveloperName

ignorefields.name: ignorefields
ignorefields.description: list of object.field path to exclude from loading (e.g. Account.OwnerId,OpportunityLineItem.TotalPrice)

defaultnamespace.name: defaultnamespace
defaultnamespace.description: developer namespace prefix for managed packages

deletebeforeload.name: deletebeforeload
deletebeforeload.description: delete all records in target objects before loading

verbose.name: verbose
verbose.description: emit additional command output to stdout

automig:package.description: Bundle record data and one-click migration script as a Salesforce Package

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

inputdir.name: inputdir
inputdir.description: directory which includes input data files in CSV

targetobjects.name: targetobjects
targetobjects.description: list of object names to include in loading

ignoreobjects.name: ignoreobjects
ignoreobjects.description: list of object names to exclude from loading

mappingobjects.name: mappingobjects
mappingobjects.description: list of object and key field name pair to map to existing records (e.g. User:Email,RecordType:DeveloperName

ignorefields.name: ignorefields
ignorefields.description: list of object.field path to exclude from loading (e.g. Account.OwnerId,OpportunityLineItem.TotalPrice)

defaultnamespace.name: defaultnamespace
defaultnamespace.description: developer namespace prefix for managed packages

packagename.name: packagename
packagename.description: package name to bundle record data and migration script

verbose.name: verbose
verbose.description: emit additional command output to stdout
